Html:
Hi,

can anyone explain me the cache mode and how to use in VB.net?

Greetz
babsitz

This code I know. What I meant: How to save to and load from a cache cile.


-------- Original message --------
Subject: Re: Cache Mode - VB.net [greatmaps:283468]
From: radioman <notifications@codeplex.com>
To: [email removed]
CC:


From: radioman

MainMap.Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerAndCache; // or etc
it's done automatically, you don't need to do anything

On cache mode I only get a blue background


-------- Original message --------
Subject: Re: Cache Mode - VB.net [greatmaps:283468]
From: radioman <notifications@codeplex.com>
To: [email removed]
CC:


From: radioman

it's done automatically, you don't need to do anything
because it's empty, you need to pretefch your area if you want to work offline

that i meant with vb.net example

Am 19.12.2011 21:11, schrieb radioman:
> ou need to pretefch your area if you want to work offline

I tested now, but the map is still blue and the following message is shown:
exception: no data in local tile cache

Am 19.12.2011 21:21, schrieb radioman:

From: radioman

use demo, select area, click prefetch
wait until it's done, it can take few minutes in the background
